name: Cerber2 Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A CERBER2 file is a file encrypted by Cerber2 ransomware, a virus utilized by cybercriminals to hijack a user's computer files. It contains a file from a computer infected by the Cerber2 virus, such as a .DOCX , .PDF , or .WMV file. CERBER2 files are encrypted with AES-265 and RSA methods.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
